QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_SlabBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of slabs.

QtoDef.Name: Width
QtoDef.Definition: Nominal width (or thickness) of the slab. Only given, if the slab is prismatic (constant thickess).

QtoDef.Name: Length
QtoDef.Definition: Length (one direction of the non-projected foot print area) of the slab. It shall only be provided, if the slab is rectangular.

QtoDef.Name: Depth
QtoDef.Definition:
Depth (one direction of the non-projected foot print area) of the slab. It shall only be provided, if the slab is rectangular.
NOTE  Also refered to as width, but not to be confused with the "Width" quantity, that denotes the thickness in the context of the slab.

QtoDef.Name: Perimeter
QtoDef.Definition: Perimeter measured along the outer boundaries of the slab. Only given, if the slab is prismatic (constant thickness).

QtoDef.Name: GrossArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total area of the extruded area of the slab. Openings, recesses and projections are not taken into account. Only given, if the slab is prismatic.

QtoDef.Name: NetArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total area of the extruded area of the slab. Openings and recesses are taken into account by subtraction, projections by addition. Only given, if the slab is prismatic.

QtoDef.Name: GrossVolume
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross volume of the slab. Openings, recesses, and projections are not taken into account.

QtoDef.Name: NetVolume
QtoDef.Definition: Total net volume of the slab. Openings and recesses are taken into account by subtraction, projections by addition.

QtoDef.Name: GrossWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross weight of the slab without add-on parts, not taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.

QtoDef.Name: NetWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Total net weight of the slab without add-on parts, taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.
